name: CHASTITY BELT MUSIC
description: Website for the band Chastity Belt, featuring an interactive fan art page and an admin login and view for the band.

name: SE7EN
description: Bucketlist app to track and explore things to do before the world ends.  Users can add activities to their bucketlist, see other users' lists, and see a map of all activites.

name: SELLING SUNSET EMPLOYEE DIRECTORY
description: Built with React so users can filter and sort employees.

name: BUDGET TRACKER
description: Progressive web app for tracking income and expenses.  Data is stored using MongoDb, and user input is saved offline with the help of indexeddb.

name: SEASONS
description: Users can log different excercises they complete during a workout, and see a graph of workouts they've done in the past week .Built with Node, Express, and MongoDB.

name: CHEESEBURGER IN PARADISE
description: Command-line content magagement system for employers.
